salaryExpectations: LKR 60,000 to LKR 200,000+ per month, often for international clients.
futureOutlook: The global shift to remote work has increased demand for Virtual Assistants. Sri Lankans can leverage their high literacy and English skills to serve international clients. While basic administrative tasks are common, VAs who can specialize in areas like social media management, bookkeeping, or technical support can command higher rates and build a stable freelance career.
